messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a horde of [REDACTED] have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a pack of [REDACTED] have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.
